alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Dale; Geneva (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 17 at 2:52PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Dale, southern Coffee and Geneva Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 252 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Fort Rucker to near Andalusia. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Daleville, Elba, Geneva, Enterprise, Fort Rucker, Hartford, Level Plains, Samson, New Brockton, Clayhatchee, Kinston, Coffee Springs, Black, Kellys Crossroads, Curtis, Carl Folsom A/p, Gerald, Central City, Logan Field Municipal A/P and Clintonville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
